title: Bad Girlfriend
overview: The story of an office romance, which tells about what happens when a careerist Ji Soo, who had an ideal relationship with two guys, turns out to be in the same company with them.Ji Soo, an advertising planner who is faithful to the desire of 'you must meet the person you like'. Tao, a capable boss, and Jiho, a youthful younger man, are proud of being both close and successful outside the company. However, as Jiho goes to work at Jisoo's company, Jisoo's seemingly perfect daily life begins to crumble... Will Ji Soo manage all these situations and continue their two-legged relationship?
